task.title: Access alternate audio tracks
task.shortdesc: Alternate audio uses MediaPlayer to play a video that is specified in an M3U8 HLS playlist and that can contain several alternate audio streams.

step.cmd: Wait for the MediaPlayer to be in at least the MediaPlayerStatus.PREPARED status.
Listen for the MediaPlayerEvent.STATUS_CHANGED event with status MediaPlayerStatus.PREPARED.

info.p: This step means that the initial list of audio tracks is available.

step.cmd: Get the available audio tracks from the MediaPlayerItem instance.
(Optional) Present the available tracks to the user.
Set the selected audio track on the MediaPlayerItem instance.
